matches.reasoning: The bank entry for 'Honey Inc. E-Trans' on 01/01/2025 matches exactly with GL entries on the same date with the same amount of $1050. The descriptions indicate a transaction with Honey Inc., which matches the bank statement description.

The bank entry for 'Bee Inc. E-Trans' on 01/02/2025 matches exactly with GL entries on the same date with the same amount of $1100. The descriptions indicate a transaction with Bee Inc., matching the bank statement description.

The bank entry for 'Goodies Inc. E-Trans' on 01/07/2025 matches with a GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description indicates a payment related to Goodies Inc., matching the bank statement description.

The bank entry for 'Baddies Wire' on 01/08/2025 matches with a GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description indicates a payment related to Baddies Inc., matching the bank statement description.

The bank entry for 'Goodies Inc. E-Trans' on 01/09/2025 matches with a GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $3000. The description indicates a payment related to Goodies Inc., matching the bank statement description.

The bank entry for 'Kings Inc. E-Trans' on 01/13/2025 matches with GL entries on 01/12/2025 for the same amount of $1000. The descriptions indicate a transaction with Kings Inc., but there is a 1-day difference, so this is a medium confidence match.

The bank entry for 'K-Foods. E-Trans' on 01/13/2025 matches with GL entries on the same date with the total amount of $108. Although the bank entry shows -$100, the GL entries show a transaction involving accounts payable and cash that clears a payment for $108, indicating a possible fee or adjustment not reflected in the bank statement.
